title: Zooey Deschanel Enthusiastically Co-Signs Pal Katy Perry’s Relationship With Justin Trudeau: ‘I Love It’
summary: The "Trolls" star who is engaged to "Property Brothers" co-host Jonathan Scott knows all about dating Canadian.
body: A week after her longtime pal Katy Perry went Instagram official with new boyfriend former Canadian prime minister Justin Trudeau , Trolls actress Zooey Deschanel has heartily co-signed the budding relationship. During an appearance on Thursday’s (Dec. 11) Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen , a fan asked Deschanel what her reaction was to Perry, 41, “hard-launching” the new love match by posting a series of pics and videos from her recent trip to Japan, which featured several cameos from the 53-year-old Canadian politician. “ I love it. I’m so in ,” Deschanel said. “I’m with a Canadian guy,” said Deschanel, who is engaged to Property Brothers co-star and Vancouver native Jonathan Scott and appeared in the video for Perry’s song “Not the End of the World” in 2020. “She’s with a Canadian guy… [They’re] so nice.” In their Dec. 6 Insta debut together, the former American Idol judge and Trudeau posed cheek-to-cheek outdoors with big smiles on their faces, shared a sushi dinner in a black-and-white video and admired a light art installation together. The photo and video dump came w…
